subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When Minaya was fired as the Mets’ general manager in 2010, some critics said he had left the team’s minor league system bare. It is time for a reassessment.
snippet: When Minaya was fired as the Mets’ general manager in 2010, some critics said he had left the team’s minor league system bare. It is time for a reassessment.
